# 6장. 메모리 계층

## cache.c

```sh
# compile
$ cc -o3 -o cache cache.c

# execution
$ for i in 4 8 16 32 64 128 256 512 1024 2048 4096 8192 16384 32768 ; do ./cache $i ; done
2.204415
2.055065
1.990049
2.067318
3.955781
3.881208
3.858698
4.895702
4.990868
5.037425
5.112966
5.656360
6.768891
7.384805
```
